```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
diamonds <- read_csv("diamonds.csv")

str(diamonds)
```
1. DispersiÃ³n
```{r}
ggplot(diamonds, aes(x=carat,y=price)) +geom_point()
ggplot(diamonds, aes(x=carat,y=price,color=clarity)) +geom_point()

```

Histograma
```{r}
ggplot(diamonds,aes(x=price)) + geom_histogram(bins=40)
ggplot(diamonds,aes(x=price)) + geom_histogram(bins=40)+scale_x_log10()

```

BOXPLOTS
```{r}
ggplot(diamonds,aes(x=cut,y=price))+geom_boxplot()+scale_y_log10() 
ggplot(diamonds,aes(x=cut,y=price,fill=cut))+geom_boxplot()+scale_y_log10() 
```


Faceting
```{r}
filter_price <- diamonds %>%
  filter(price > 1000 & (cut=="Good" | cut =="Ideal" | cut=="Premium"))
filter_price
ggplot(filter_price,aes(x=cut,y=depth))+geom_col()+facet_wrap(~ clarity)
ggplot(filter_price,aes(x=cut,y=depth,fill=clarity))+geom_col()+facet_wrap(~ clarity)
```

Grouping and summarizing
1
```{r}
median_dimension_diamond <- diamonds %>%
  group_by(cut)%>%
  summarise(mediaX=median(x),mediaY=median(y),mediaZ=median(z))

median_dimension_diamond
```
2
```{r}
cut_premium <- diamonds %>%
  filter(cut == "Premium") %>%
  group_by(clarity)%>%
  summarise(minPrice=min(price),maxPrice=max(price))

cut_premium
```

3
```{r}
ggplot(cut_premium,aes(x=clarity,y=maxPrice,fill=clarity))+geom_col()
```
